column4: and bernardtk changing the xorg.conf does not have an effect. I tried to manually add modes to no avail.
sudo dontzap --disable then ctrl-alt-backspace works for me
I just did it and it doesn't seem to work :P weird.
Just thought you'd like to know the nvidia screen resolution problem was fixed when I manually installed the drivers (185.18.14) instead of the 180.44 package.
